<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.planned_maintenance" name="SM Planned Maintenance" version="1.0.0" help="SM_Planned_Maintenance" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management.core" /> </requires>
<description>Allows setup and configuration for repeating and triggered requests. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details. </description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Allows setup and configuration for repeating and triggered requests.
